title: Angela Merkel: What will Germans miss about the chancellor?

description: The actress says Kim Kardashian has inspired the "uncharted territory" of her first UK stage role.

title: Changing China: Why Xi Jinping is leading a way back to socialism
description: China has not been very socialist for years, but the Communist Party looks set to change that.

title: Covid-19: New allergic reactions to hair dye reported
description: Scientists at Imperial College London are now researching a link between Covid-19 and new allergies.

description: Racers, start your engines. We're saying "hello, hello, hello" to the queens of season three.

title: Claims on pay, tax and the cost of living checked

title: La Palma volcano lava engulfs homes and swimming pools
description: Molten rock from the erupting Cumbre Vieja volcano is destroying hundreds of buildings.

title: US lifting ban on imports of British lamb, says Boris Johnson
description: The PM says farmers can export to the US, and insists the chances of a wider trade deal are not fading.

title: Premier League & Championship clubs can trial safe standing from 1 January
description: Premier League and Championship clubs have been asked for expressions of interest to pilot safe standing this season.

title: Netflix lands golden ticket by buying Roald Dahl estate
description: The streaming giant will own and control works like Charlie and the Chocolate Factory and The BFG.

title: Gas crisis: Head of regulator warns more customers face hit

title: Fury's promoter Warren confident fight with Joshua will happen
description: Frank Warren says he is "confident" Tyson Fury's undisputed heavyweight title fight with Anthony Joshua will happen.

title: Covishield: UK recognises Covid jab after India outcry
description: With more than 721 million doses administered so far, Covishield is India's most widely used vaccine.

title: Teen inmate whose baby died in prison was failed, report says

title: Getafe 1-2 Atletico Madrid: Luis Suarez score twice as Atletico Madrid go top of La Liga.

title: Fraudsters steal £4m a day as crime surges

title: Swimmers dodge jellyfish on four islands challenge

title: Seaside suburb inspires worldwide photo collaboration
